title: The Post To End Them All
content: Did you know that this is a really cool blog? It has like words and colors and even a date - so cool. I'd totally read this blog if I had the time, but sadly I don't, I'm too busy making really cool blogs. I want to keep making things like this with nice colors and nice formatting because it makes me really happy. There's a blog post for ya.
